title: Ticket #2304: SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE references schedd, not shadow
description:
This is a simple documentation bug, but it's been there since this option was first documented in v7.0.0.

Sarah pointed out on condor-users that the documentation for SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE is incorrect. It claims: 

 This expression behaves identically to the job expression periodic_remove, but it is evaluated by the condor_schedd daemon individually for each job in the queue.
but it's really the condor_shadow daemon that evaluates SYSTEM_PERIODIC_REMOVE.
remarks:
2011-Jul-14 14:05:24 by matt:
Both would probably be correct. Schedd if the job is not running and Shadow if it is.
